DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify a safe and tolerable dose of the drug KU-0059436 that can be given in combination with gemcitabine chemotherapy for the treatment of pancreatic cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Safety & Tolerability of a PARP Inhibitor in Combination With Gemcitabine in Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of pancreas Locally advanced or metastatic unresectable disease No prior anti cancer chemotherapy, radiotherapy (except palliative >4 weeks prior to entry, endocrine or immunotherapy or use of other investigational agents;
